data.name: Happy Animal Testing
data.detailed_description:
Happy Animal Testing simultaneously puts you in the mindset of a cooperative lab rat, a saboteuring monkey, and a suicidal bunny. Play alone or with your friends as you attempt to navigate a maze of puzzles with ranging levels of difficulty. Work together or prove that you are the most smartest-est of your cohorts.

data.short_description: Do you trust your friends? Happy Animal Testing puts your faith in your friends under a microscope. This multiplayer puzzle-platformer will see if your relationships survive testing.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, or 10
  • Processor: 2GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, or 10
  • Processor: 2GHz+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10.8+ Mountain Lion
  • Processor: 2GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 750M 2 GB Intel Iris Pro 1536 MB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10.8+ Mountain Lion
  • Processor: 2GHz+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 750M 2 GB Intel Iris Pro 1536 MB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
